title: 4: S5E04 – "Pick Your Poisons" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Eric Scott, E.C. Mann, Colby Newton, and Kristopher Mallory, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about artificial fiends, the not-so-great outdoors, fear-inducing fog, and curious cadavers. Sign up to our mailing list to be entered to win monthly giveaways and custom stories, plus access to EXCLUSIVE subscriber-only narrations and inside updates: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/otis/ See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s5e04
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
